msbt.message: Hoppity hey, luck has come your way!
Hoppity hey, luck has come your way!

There's an egg festival hop-hop- happening on your island right now. I've hidden eggs and eggy recipes all about. Open your peepers! Find those sneakers! And enjoy this Bunny Day bed recipe I cooked up!

Here's the egg recipe I couldn't give you the other day! Whip it up lickety-split. I promise you won't regret it! Also, I've hidden eggs and egg recipes all around your island. Do your best to find 'em!

There's an egg festival hop-hop- happening on your island right now. I've hidden eggs and eggy recipes all about. Open your peepers! Find those sneakers! Take these water eggs, and join the egg seekers!

Here are the water eggs I couldn't give you the other day! Craft 'em up lickety-split. I promise you won't regret it! I've also hidden eggs and egg recipes all around your island. Do your best to find 'em!
